channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 10:30 p.m. Alarm sounding in Kherson region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 10:30 p.m. Alarm sounding in Kherson region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Херсонська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 22:12 Air alert in Kherson Oblast. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🔴 22:12 Air alert in Kherson Oblast. Stay tuned for further messages. #Херсонська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 22:03 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in Myrivsk territorial community. Take shelter!
item.description: 🔴 22:03 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in Myrivsk territorial community. Take shelter! #Мирівська_териториальна_громада This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 20:59 Repulse of the alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets territorial community - m. Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community - Pokrovsk Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 20:59 Repulse of the alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets territorial community - m. Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community - Pokrovsk Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_Oblast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
